alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; Annette Island; Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Wrangell; City and Borough of Yakutat; City of Hyder; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Haines Borough and Klukwan; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Municipality of Skagway; Petersburg Borough; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 03 at 2:53PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...VERY COLD TEMPERATURES EXPECTED THIS WEEKEND... The first arctic airmass of the season will spill into Southeast Alaska beginning Friday and lasting through the weekend. This airmass will usher in the coldest air so far this season with lows by Sunday night bottoming out in the single digits above zero in wind sheltered areas across the northern Panhandle, ranging to the teens elsewhere. Strong winds will accompany the cold air in places exposed to NE winds such as downtown Juneau and Skagway which will drive windchill values below zero at times. Preparations should be made now to protect persons and property that are vulnerable to these cold temperatures.
